about:
Hi Everyone, this is Kaveesha a professional graphic designer, having 3 years of work experience.
  Designing is my passion, that's the reason I made it my profession.
  I know you are in search of something unique and out of box, I am whole heartedly ready to provide you the perfect shot.
  Feel free to call for 1 to 1 projects.

about: Joy is the word that comes to mind when you see my design. You think it, you feel it, you love it. Why? Because in addition to being detailed-oriented and striving for perfection, I pray over each design before I send it your way. My designs are inspired and it is my greatest desire that you would be blessed with what I can create for you.

about: I have been a designer for 8 years, initially I stood out in areas such as print creation, WordPress pages, animation. When I went out to work I began to work in an NGO for 3 years, in that I was in charge of doing branding, make printed material. about:
I am a graphic designer with many years of experience. In my work I strive to find simple but effective and meaningful graphical solutions.
  I am always ready to help you with logo, branding, stationery design etc. Do not hesitate to contact me, if you have some questions! I'm open to 1-to-1 projects.

about:
Designer from Ukraine.
  37 years
  Since 2009 I have been working as a freelance graphic designer.
  In my work I am guided by the main rule: "originality and practicality".
  Design should speak for itself. I do not use overused-overdone concepts, clipart’s or stock images at my work, except the customer request (within copyright).

about:

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about: I like clean, uncluttered, design that is simple, easy to understand and remember. I think that the best design is the one that gets the message through and not the one that stops people marveling at the appearance. That's art and art only sells itself.

about: Hi, I'm Amit kumar. I have 6+ years experience in creating logo & Graphic designs from start ups to large companies. I love designing logos, Graphic designs and other branding material. I provide custom designs, high work ethic and client satisfaction. I work on one project at a time and I give 100% of my personal attention to the project I'm working on. Quality for me is not just "conformance to requirement".

about: Design veteran - enjoying the creative process, from the conceptual sketch (yes, paper is still involved) to the final art. The idea is just as important as the mechanics. Dogwings creates custom logos, branding,themed graphics, and illustrations with excellence. One of my favorite quotes:creativity is allowing oneself to make mistakes, art is knowing which ones to keep. Website:Dogwings.us

about: I am a graphic designer specializing in logo and visual identity. I prefer a simple, clean, and abstract design style. I always try my best to create original and memorable design concepts. I also care about your satisfaction. If you are interested in my work, please invite me through a 1-on-1 project.

about: Hi! I'm Carol Velasco Graphic Designer and Digital Illustrator.  The image is my passion and the line is my language. I highly value creative development. I move between the traditional and the digital media. I have experience in Branding, logo, editorial design, covers, posters, flyers, business cards, social media content, advertising  short video ads,  illustration and product design. I help you promote your brand from a new visible, active and visually committed way to today's society.

about:

about:
I have been a graphic designer for more than a decade. Majority of my concepts are unique with a twist. My design expertise are logo, stationery & brochure.
  Tools I use in designing are Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator & CorelDraw.
  My creative imagination and dedication is what I offer best!

about: I've been a Graphic Designer for the past 23 years now, and have been freelance for the last 10. I've previously worked in many genres of design, gaining a vast array of experience. These have included a print studio, a banner firm and an Architect firm, covering everything from logos to large format, hand sketching to vector design. I am very passionate about my work, and love how every new project is completely different, it’s what keeps the job so enjoyable!

about: I have a strong belief that successful brands should communicate simply yet powerfully to create an emotional connection with their customers. Over the years I have developed a strong understanding of the importance of the brand to a company’s business. I have successfully applied creative solutions across multiple touch points that have delivered tangible results for companies large and small.
